articles.author: Shaurya Tomer
articles.title: Astronaut shares breathtaking images of auroras from ISS after Geomagnetic storm hits Earth - HT Tech
articles.description: European Space Agency astronaut Samantha Cristoretti has shared breathtaking images of auroras on Earth captured up in the sky from the International Space Station after a Geomagnetic storm hit Earth.
articles.content: Auroras or Northern lights are shifting curtains of light in greens, blues and pinks which light up the night sky in the Northern and Southern poles. They are called Northern Lights or Aurora Borelis… [+1667 chars]

articles.title: US President Joe Biden announces nearly $US3 billion in new military aid for Ukraine - ABC News
articles.description: As the war in Ukraine drags on, US security assistance is shifting to a longer-term campaign that also will likely keep more American military troops in Europe into the future, US officials said.
